# Hat of Disguise (Greater)
## Overview
**Aura** faint illusion; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** head

**Price** 12,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

Like a *[[Hat of Disguise|hat of disguise]]*, this garment allows its wearer to alter her appearance. It functions as an *[[Alter Self (Spell)|alter self]]* spell (as opposed to *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]*). The hat becomes a part of the disguise and can be a hat, a helmet, a headscarf, and so forth.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Alter Self (Spell)|alter self]]*

**Cost** 6,000 gp

**Source:** Curse of the Riven Sky, pg. 30
